info.title: Kener API
info.description:
# Kener Selfhost node js status page
![Kener](https://kener.ing/newbg.png "kener")
API specification for Kener status page and incident management system. This API spec was created using [Frogment](https://www.frogment.app)

get.description: Retrieve all category groups for the home page

post.description: Create a new category group for the home page. Requires admin or editor role.

put.description: Replace all categories with a new list. First category must be 'Home'. Requires admin or editor role.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the category (URL-encoded if contains spaces)

get.description: Retrieve a single category by its name

put.description: Update an existing category's properties. Cannot rename 'Home' category. Requires admin or editor role.

patch.description: Partially update a category (same as PUT but more semantically correct for partial updates). Requires admin or editor role.

delete.description: Delete a category by name. Cannot delete 'Home' category. Requires admin or editor role.

get.description: Retrieve all notification channel configurations with optional status filter

get.description: Retrieve a single trigger by its ID

patch.description: Partially update a trigger (same as PUT but more semantically correct for partial updates). Requires admin or editor role.

delete.description: Delete a trigger by ID. Requires admin or editor role.

get.description: Retrieve paginated system-generated alert history. Alerts are read-only as they are automatically created from monitor checks.
